text: @GregAbbott_TX These numbers are misleading, governor. Don’t just squawk back what @realDonaldTrump is saying. 13% unemployment of people making a certain amount of money. But what of the COVID-19 related unemployment numbers? Those were deliberately left out! #ICallBullshit
